comments.body: :O This is awesome! Forgot that `pandas.read_csv` supported this! Thanks @harupy

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +113,117 @@def run(training_data, epochs, batch_size, learning_rate, momentum, seed):
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    data = pd.read_csv(training_data, sep=';')
    # Split the data into training and test sets. (0.75, 0.25) split.
    train, test = train_test_split(data, random_state=seed)
